title: Add item deletion functionality to admin panel

requirements.summary: Create a useDeleteItem React Query mutation hook that calls the backend deleteItem method and invalidates the items query cache on success
acceptanceCriteria: Hook provides a mutation function to delete items by ID
Successfully invalidates and refetches the items list after deletion
Handles loading and error states appropriately

file_operations.description: Add a useDeleteItem mutation hook using useMutation from React Query that calls the backend deleteItem method with the item ID, invalidates the 'items' query cache on success to trigger a refetch, and provides mutation state including isLoading and error for UI feedback

requirements.summary: Add delete buttons to each item in the ItemList component that trigger the useDeleteItem mutation with confirmation dialog
acceptanceCriteria: Each item in the admin list displays a delete button
Clicking delete shows a confirmation dialog before deletion
Successful deletion removes the item from the displayed list
Delete button is styled consistently with the existing teal/emerald theme

file_operations.description: Import and use the useDeleteItem hook, add a delete button to each item in the list styled with the teal/emerald theme colors, implement a confirmation dialog using window.confirm before executing the deletion, call the deleteItem mutation with the item ID when confirmed, and display appropriate loading/error states during deletion
